website_summaries.verdict: The on-ear B&O Play Beoplay H8i headphones deliver strong, balanced Bluetooth audio and solid noise cancellation for a high price.
pros: Strong audio performance with deep bass response and crisp, bright highs
Transparency mode lets you hear your surroundings

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality but annoyingly tends to slip
customer_reviews.text: As expected from B&O the sound quality is excellent. But, there are two irritating issues- it tends to slip off the head for any slight movement of the head and correspondingly cuts off the sound. Thus the four and not five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Njiff

customer_reviews.title: Drops bluetooth connection all the time.
customer_reviews.text: The headset now keeps dropping it connection with my I-phone. It never used to. Updated the headphones via the B&O site but made no difference. Very frustrating. Sound quality is very good whist connected but just too hit and miss with its poor bluetooth connections. I find myself just wiring the headphones direct to my iPhone to listen to music as it's the only way to guarantee a connection.
customer_reviews.author: Snapper

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth does not work well
customer_reviews.text: Having previously owned a pair of Bose headphones I wanted to try a different high-end brand. The B&O headphones do not work well with Bluetooth for iPhone X. The sounds dips in and out or the Bluetooth won’t connect at all. The headphones work fine with the aux cord but not well as wireless headphones.

customer_reviews.title: Solid 4 Rating
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is really good on Bluetooth and even better chorded. It definitely takes a bit to get use to the controls. I am having a similar issue to other reviewers where if I lean over, the headphones will fall off. Another issue I’m having is the auto pause. I’ll be walking or move slightly and the sound will pause. I wish there was a way to turn this feature off. The headphones are really stylish and comfortable. I had trouble deciding between the h9i and h8i due to the over ear difference, but I’m glad I went with the on ear because the battery life is superior to the h9i.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome performance
customer_reviews.text: Sound: very clear. The included app lets you tailor the sound. Great bass, mids, and highs. Transparency Mode: VERY clear. I was shocked at the performance - you can whisper and hear yourself very clearly. No hiss apparent. Noise Cancelling: I have to test this on an airplane - in the office, it is very effective.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones and great deal
customer_reviews.text: Most popular in this category are Sony and Bose. Where B&O shines is battery life and design. I also like the option to listen via wired connection. I have not had any issues. These headphones are comfortable, Bluetooth pairs easily, B&O app (iPad) simple and easy to use. My main use is at work to drown out ambient chitter chatter while listening to music, enjoyable and much less distracting. Excellent build. Probably will buy hard shell case. 5 stars for sound (cannot provide comparison, sorry).

customer_reviews.title: B&O (Bang & Olufsen) headphones - outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: First, yes, I have a set of BOSE headphones (that plug into my iPhone). So, I enjoy good headphones.These Bang & Olufsen? Outstanding. The sound is crystal clear and I have no complaints at all. The directions were a bit confusing (yes, I couldn't figure out how to sync it with bluetooth as it took a few tries for it to work), but the sound is outstanding. It is lightweight and the controls (on/off, volume, etc..) are on the bottom parts of the left and right headphones. They are comfortable to wear and when I put them on (before the music) I can hear no sounds around me (much like my Bose headphones). Outstanding. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I confess I had trouble setting this product up. And I could not identify all the accessories this product came with (the instructions did not indicate what they were either). The B&O website was very unhelpful, as was the instruction manual the product came with. However, once my brother figured it out and set it up for me, it worked really well and was so comfortable. I wish it came with a better storage/folding option because these would be great for travel, but I think would get really damaged in a backpack or purse. Five star product, one star off for bad instructions.

product_meta.title: B&O PLAY by Bang & Olufsen Beoplay H8i Wireless Bluetooth On-Ear Headphones with Active Noise Cancellation (ANC), Transparency mode and Microphone Black - 1645126
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

"With a contemporary, streamlined design and advanced features, Beoplay H8i wireless ANC headphones make it easy to enjoy rich Bang and Olufsen Signature Sound on the go.

H8i features a convenient Transparency Mode that lets you tune in, or out, of your surroundings with a single click. An innovative built-in proximity sensor automatically pauses audio when you remove your headphones and then picks up the beat when you put them back on. To expand your sound, pair these high-quality headphones wirelessly with up to two devices at the same time—with an increased Bluetooth range of more than 100 feet, you have the freedom to move away from your devices while still enjoying seamless music streaming. When it's time to make a call, you can communicate clearly with these wireless headphones thanks to two dedicated microphones that are positioned at the optimal angle and distance for superior voice quality.

Using the Beoplay app, you can turn ANC on or off, adjust tonality, and select preset ToneTouch sound profiles to customize your listening experience. The updated H8i Bluetooth headphones feature a significant increase in battery capacity over their predecessor, with an intelligent battery-saving function and optimal circuit system that exceeds industry standards for up to 30 hours of playtime. When the battery eventually needs recharging, the lengthy USB-C charging cable lets listen comfortably while you wait and is compatible with all Beoplay Bluetooth speakers.

Designed by Danish industrial designer Jakob Wagner, these high-quality headphones feature a durable leather headband, smooth anodized aluminum discs, and soft lambskin and memory foam ear cushions for a luxurious look and feel. Ideal for active lifestyles, these sleek on-ear headphones are as attractive as they are functional and at just 0.5 lbs., they’re comfortable enough to wear all day, wherever your music takes you."

Battery: Up to 30 hours with Bluetooth and ANC, Up to 45 hours with Bluetooth only, Up to 42 hours wired with ANC + control, Charging time: approximately 3.5 hours.
feature_bullets: NEVER MISS A BEAT: H8i wireless headphones have a built-in proximity sensor that automatically stops playback when you remove your headphones and resumes when you put them back on.
